Class ActionManager

java.lang.Object
  




public class ActionManager
extends Object

The ActionManager Class is responsible for handling the keyInputs (and possibly later mouse inputs) and determining a proper response

Version:
(0.1)
Author:
(John Remmes)

Method Detail

getActionRange

public void getActionRange(int range,
                           int beginX,
                           int beginY,
                           String p)
recursive method to get range of action and store in level does not handle AOEs yet and attacks like a spear

Parameters:
range - range of character's attack
beginX - X posistion to start at
beginY - Y posistion to start at
p - string of path to get to tile

getMovement

public void getMovement(int range,
                        int beginX,
                        int beginY,
                        String p)
recursive method to get range of movement and store in level

Parameters:
range - range of moving character
beginX - X posistion to start at
beginY - Y posistion to start at
p - string of path to get to tile

inMovement

public boolean inMovement(int x,
                          int y)
helper method that returns if a x,y posistion is in movement range

Parameters:
x - x-posistion to be used
y - y-posistion to be used
Returns:
boolean value of wheter the posistion is in range

inMoveThrough

public boolean inMoveThrough(int x,
                             int y)
helper method that returns if a x,y posistion is able to be moved through

Parameters:
x - x-posistion to be used
y - y-posistion to be used
Returns:
boolean value of wheter the posistion is in range

moveCursor

public boolean moveCursor(KeyEvent e)
method to move cursort. currently not used. previously used in testing

Parameters:
e - KeyEvent to be handled
Returns:
returns true if the cursor was able to move correctly

moveCursorAction

method to move cursor when in an action state.

Parameters:
e - KeyEvent to be handled
Returns:
returns true if the cursor was able to move correctly

moveCursorMove

public boolean moveCursorMove(KeyEvent e)
method to move cursor when in a move state.

moveWithObject

public boolean moveWithObject(KeyEvent e,
                              PhysicalObject thing)
method to move cursor and object. currently not used. previously used in testing

Parameters:

thing - Object to be used
Returns:
returns true if the cursor was able to move correctly

reaction

public void reaction(KeyEvent e)
workhourse for ActionManager class. determines output depending on state and event.

Parameters:
e - KeyEvent to be handled
